Description:
Position Title:             Cloud Ambassador – Team Leader Employment Type:     FulltimeSalary:                         up to 12K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:             Abu Dhabi, UAE About the Client:A well-established provider of flexible workspace solutions in the region. Job Responsibilities:Handle a team of at least 3 ambassadors to manage their KPIs, tasks/schedules and work with marketing team to hold events and guest speakers.
Exceed the operating profit as projected with your General Manager for your location by maintaining floor occupancy levels above 85%.
Understand all organization USPs and how clients can benefit and how we offer solutions that add value to our clients’ businesses.
Keep CRM up to date with correct sales notice details & Agreements uploaded along with all sales opportunities as per the system standards.
Ensure client is assisted with settling in to feel well accommodated and welcome; and attend to client queries or concerns within 24 hours. Skills
Skills:
Open to Arabic speakers
Female, 30+ years old
Should have at least 8 years’ experience
Should be highly presentable with good communication skills
